name: Hanahaki
description:
Point and click-ish, mostly just narrative. . And gay. Very gay. Inspired by the fictional disease Hanahaki-byo.

I started it with a passion and planned on something longer and with multiple endings, but I’m not sure if I want to keep working on it now. As it is, it has one ending and should be around 10-20 minutes. Also canva is a wonderful app and I will protect it.
